1)if i get the "dvd error 1053" from USB Loader it means that i can't play games that i have burnt in dvd?I tried via usb and it worked but with WiiFlow.
2)Are there problems with HDD usb 3.0?I want to buy a WD my passport essential and i need to know if it works good with WiiFlow,as it is the only program i can use to play games.
